quotes.quote: Today is a lovely day to be alive!

You do not just wake up and become a butterfly. Growth is a process.

Better days are coming. They are called Saturday and Sunday.
Be silly. Be honest. Be kind.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Every card you make is a step towards mastery.
Flashcards turn learning into a game you can win.
Today's flashcards are tomorrow's success stories.
Unlock your potential with every flip of a card.
Master your subjects, one flashcard at a time.

Knowledge is power, and flashcards are your tool.
Practice makes progress, and flashcards make it fun.
